lsr.player_config.playing: You will be playing the game
lsr.player_config.spectating: You will be spectating the game
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.title: The Boogeyman
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.descr: You are the Boogeyman. You must by any means necessary kill a %1$s or %2$s name by direct action to be cured of the curse. If you fail, next session you will become a %3$s name. All loyalties and friendships are removed while you are the Boogeyman.
If you don't get automatically cured when you perform a kill, please notify an operator.
lsr.boogeyman.choose.not_the_boogeyman.d: You are NOT the Boogeyman. The Boogeyman needs, by any means, kill a %1$s or %2$s name by direct action to be cured of the curse. All loyalties and friendships are removed while they are the Boogeyman. Beware of everyone!
lsr.boogeyman.punish.description.p1: You failed to kill a %1$s or %2$s name last session as the Boogeyman. As punishment, you have dropped to your %3$s. All alliances are severed and you are now hostile to all players. You may team with others on their Last Life if you wish.
lsr.menu.credits.title: Credits
lsr.menu.pack.title: Life Series Recreation
lsr.misc.last_life.p1: You have dropped to your %s. All alliances are severed and you are now hostile to all players. You may team with others on their Last Life if you wish.
lsr.util.check_operator_status.p2: Run %s to open the Main Menu
lsr.misc.eliminated.title: You have been eliminated
lsr.boogeyman.cure.not_enough_players: You have been cured, as there is no one for you to kill.
lsr.menu.credits.developers.title: Developers
